Articles.Content:
I took the spike engine and turned it into an intake for all of your fun, the original spike engine is untouched from this, it\'s a separate part, and sense it\'s the spike engine, it doesn\'t need any pictures (unless you really want them)

[http://www./download.php?cqi2f1nt2lluj2b](http://www./download.php?cqi2f1nt2lluj2b)

Just open the RAR file, and paste the spikeintake inside to parts.

Enjoy.
That\'s a config-edited Aerospike engine. No pics should be needed.
It looks better being an intake... If the spike would be bigger it would look like an intake from a SR-71 Blackbird.
